resources.string: C. Electronic Lock with LCD Screen System\t\t
G. Other House Safety and Securtiy Gadgets\t\t
A. Condition of door locking system\t\t
B. Security Iron Grill on window and ventilator\t\t
C. Added Security Locks/DeadLock on rear/back side gate\t\t
D. Venerability of entry from roof/ventilator window/backside\t\t
E. If AC/Cooler is fixed from outside,whether, having safety grill outside\t\t
A. Deployments of security guard(As in case of Apartment)\t\t
B. External surrounding security feature adopted by RWA such as Gates/CCTV/Guards\t\t
C. Having provision of Cross Bell/Alarm System with neighbour for any SOS message in case of emergency\t\t
D. Whether neighbours/RWA are in regular touch\t\t
E. Whether BEAT police officer is regularly visiting the house\t\t
F. Lighting in surrounding Area/Street Lighting\t\t
